__e: At 1:15 came Mrs Hubbard's announcement that there was a man in her room, who had, for reasons which I dare not even guess, shed a button.
The, um, epic struggle of a coward, who left his home, wrote a book about the friends and family that he abandoned for reasons unknown and now is afraid to face his own life.

She's got 11 hours to give this unsub what he didn't get from his own mother.
And then I sit and eat, but in my head, I'm having dinner with the unsub, whoever that might be.
